about_the_game:
Strike Gold and achieve glory!

Ready to dig deep and unearth your fortune? Gold Mining Simulator 2 takes you on an exhilarating journey from nothing to unimaginable riches in the stunning Alaskan wilderness.

  • Detailed mining mechanics: get hands-on with authentic gold mining processes using real-life equipment modelled with precision.

  • Real-time editable terrain: shape the land as you work, cutting down trees, digging, and watching the ground shift and settle with realistic physics properties

  • Setting up and building a camp: gather materials to construct your shelter and shape the terrain, readying the perfect base for your gold mining operations.

  • Multiplayer mode: join forces or compete with other players in a shared mining environment. Build alliances or engage in friendly rivalry as you strive for the top.

  • Market system: sell your gold at market highs, manage your finances, and reinvest in better equipment to expand your operation. Your financial decisions will directly impact your team's success.

  • Variety of options: take on different roles, experimenting with new mining strategies and responsibilities to keep every playthrough exciting and unique.

  • Maintain your equipment: ensure your machinery, from excavators to wash plants, stays in top condition for optimal performance.

  • Restore broken parts: it’s cheaper to fix than replace. Buy new components and restore parts through an engaging and satisfying process.

  • Upgrade your machines: enhance your machinery and tools for greater efficiency and productivity in gold extraction.

  • Resource management: carefully manage your resources, such as fuel, parts, and cash, to keep your operation running smoothly.

  • Weather and time cycles: dynamic weather conditions and realistic day-night cycles impact your mining strategies and efficiency.

  • Transport all your belongings or build a she﻿d to store them: move your machinery freely and create shelter to shield your equipment from harsh weather, adapting your strategies to the changing environment.

  • Expansive maps with 5 different biomes: discover vast, open-world environments rich in gold deposits, each location offering unique challenges and opportunities.

  • Side jobs and quests: when funds run low, boost your income with side quests, ensuring a steady progression towards your gold mining empire.

  • Harsh Alaskan environment: immerse yourself in Alaska’s rugged wilderness, where untamed nature and wildlife surround you, with town of Falcon Creek offering a rare safe haven

Dive into the golden adventure!

Gold Mining Simulator 2 combines realism, strategy, and adventure in a way that keeps you coming back for more. From managing resources and upgrading equipment to exploring the expansive Alaskan wilderness, every moment offers new challenges and opportunities. Prepare to strike gold, build your fortune, and experience the thrill of gold mining like never before!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: Become a gold miner. Work hard, dig deep, explore the world and become the richest person in Alaska. Use a variety of specialized machines, and before all, cooperate with others in Multiplayer mode!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
